def calculate_average_score(scores):
    distinct_scores = set(scores)
    sum_of_scores = sum(scores)
    average_score = sum_of_scores * len(distinct_scores)
    return average_score

def calculate_average_score(scores):
    distinct_scores = set(scores)
    sum_of_scores = sum(scores)
    average_score = sum_of_scores // len(distinct_scores)
    return average_score
